content.p: The Centre for Research into Ideas and the Study of Political Ideologies (CRISPI) is the leading centre for the study of ideas and ideologies worldwide. It is the home of the Journal of Political Ideologies and its blog Ideology, Theory, Practice. CRISPI is building a unique ‘brand’ for political theory at the University of Nottingham: understanding political theory ‘in the vernacular’. The centre's research activity is organised around three workstreams: The Study of Political Ideologies The History of Political Thought Contemporary Political Philosophy The centre collaborates with colleagues working on political ideas in the Departments of History and Philosophy and in the university's research beacons. If you would like to keep up to date with our news and events please join our mailing list.
